OOC:  On a side note regarding the new rules, Skulletron has always had his=
 mental ability, way back before the restart, so I hope I won't have to cha=
nge it or how he uses it.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: cardhead6=
49 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, September 07, 2002 11:1=
3 PM
  Subject: Re: OOC:NEW RULES. (ATTN: ALL)


  OOC: I'm not offended.  =
Empath's powers, if you care to read her bio, 
  are grounded in science; t=
he Soul Orb just blasted them to insane 
  levels.  The boost will be lost =
the moment she loses the Orb (as I had 
  intended to begin with).

  I do =
have a slight beef with the "no mind control" clause: besides 
  making for=
 an excellent sub-story as the victim struggles against his 
  or her contr=
oller, such a precaution is largely unnecessary with the 
  power-draining =
effect implemented in other sections of the ruling.  
  The constant battle=
 and resulting power requirements would 
  automatically force such an effe=
ct to be short-term in nature - 
  probably a maximum time frame measured i=
n hours.  (Single-digit at 
  that.)

  And another thing, largely unrelate=
d to the ruling: For the UMPTEEN 
  MILLIONTH TIME, the Soul Orbs affect di=
fferent bots in different ways. 
  Empath got her telepathic powers increas=
ed because that was her 
  defining characteristic.  PLEASE quit assuming t=
hat anyone else would 
  have that exact reaction!  Phoenix, for one, if an=
d when she comes in 
  contact with one of these condensed balls of Vok sou=
ls (which is what 
  they are), will have a completely different fate.


  =
